Description: Up today we have a killer B.C. Rich Mockingbird Special. The B.C. Rich Mockingbird Special is a neck-through guitar scaled to 24-3/4" scale. With a deeply arched top, solid 1/2" maple cap, 5-ply binding and cloud inlays, the Special has a classic appearance. Other features include a strategically positioned three-way toggle switch, two volume and two tone controls, stop tailpiece, Tune-O-Matic style bridge and vintage specified Rockfield humbucker pickups. Guitar plays and sounds amazing! For more info, please review the condition description and pics. Have any questions, feel free to ask! :) Please ask any and all questions, prior to purchasing. **Sold as is, no returns** item has been described accurately. No case or bag, but will be packaged extremely well for safe shipping. With proper shipping materials. Ships insured with tracking and signature confirmation. Please do not agree to buy if you do not plan to pay.
Title: B.C. Rich Mockingbird Special Neck Thru Black 6 String Electric Guitar
ConditionDescription: In great used condition. Does have some light swirl marks on the back. And a couple scratches near the toggle switch back plate. Also has some pick/play wear on the front near the pickups. Other than that, the guitar is in great condition. Still has factory plastic on the back control plate and toggle switch plate. (Please note: in the second pic, that is just the reflection of the bottom of the guitar stand, and not a mark on the guitar.)  Electronics tested and working. Neck is good and straight. Frets are in excellent condition. Great player!!!
